aboutus_desc_key:
BarON - pub / bar located in the very center of Cracow (ul. Stefana Batorego 1). Bar with excellent beers and drinks, where you can play togheter with your friends the most popular games for the XBOX ONE consoles (FIFA 20, Mortal Kombat XL, Teeken, Forza 6 and more) or party / strategy board games.

Obviously, our customers play games (console and board games) free of charge!


So, let's go BarON!
